subject: Dear  Sir/MadamI apologize i
body:
Dear  Sir/MadamI apologize if the content of my email is contrary to
your moral ethics but I find it advantageous to offer you my
partnership in business. I am Capt. Benson Morgan  , an officer in the
US ARMY presently serving in the Military with the 82nd Airborne
Division Peacekeeping Force here in the US Military Base in Syria. I
need your help in assisting me with the safekeeping of Two Military
Trunk Boxes.
I hope you can be trusted? If you can be trusted, I will explain
further when I get a response from you for further
clarification.Nevertheless, please ensure to reply via my private
email:.
Thanks for your understanding and cooperation, God bless you and America!!!
Best Regards,
Capt.Benson Morgan,
US ARMY.(PRESENTLY IN SYRIA

subject: Re:   Dear  Sir/MadamI apologize i
body:
Dear Capt. Benson Morgan,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I understand that you are currently serving in the US Army in Syria and require my assistance with two military trunk boxes. While I may not fully comprehend the nature of your request, I am willing to listen and offer any help within my capacity.

Could you please provide more details about the specific assistance you need? It would be helpful for me to understand how I can be of service to you. Additionally, if there are any concerns or questions you have, feel free to ask, and I will do my best to address them.

Looking forward to your response via this email thread.

Best wishes,
Perry

subject: Dear Perry
body:
Dear  Perry  .

I confirm the receipt of your mail and the content is well understood and
noted. Be rest assured that this project is 100% risk free. There is no
trouble because I did my homework very well. Before we proceed let me take
a little time to explain the origin of these funds and why I am sending
them to you.

During our war campaign then in Iraq, my team was responsible for a lot of
raids on Saddam (Iraqi former president) palaces, while on raid, we
discovered the sum of $140 Million dollars packed into military trunk boxes
and hidden in Saddam's underground secret chambers.

Honestly, my first instinct was to report this to the command officer but
on second thought, I have sacrificed years to serve and protect my great
country, most of us have lost friends and loved ones while on duty. I have
been married twice of which none ever lasted for up to 3yrs due to the
nature of my job. The most painful one is My 16yr old son turned into a
drug addict as he lacked parental guidance and eventually died of an
overdose. I can't begin to mention all my sacrifices and losses.

This is a fortune for both of us hence, the funds belonged to an ex-tyrant
whom we captured and has been executed by the International Court of
Justice. As the leader of my unit I reported the sum of $120 million
dollars out of the funds discovered and I will use my position to move the
remaining (US$20 million dollars) to you for safekeeping until after my
assignment and retirement.

The boxes will be sent as Swift Military Consignment/Courier specially with
immunity to deliver to your physical mailing address. It will be done this
way to ensure maximum security. I must assure you that you will benefit
very much and you will never regret assisting me, I have already made solid
plans to ensure that this deal is 100% untraceable.

Your efforts and assistance will be rewarded with 40% of the money if you
are able to handle this deal and keep the boxes safe until I return to the
U.S. and move to your home contact. I will take care of shipping expenses
including insurance. However, once I conclude with the delivery company
that will nominate their agent who will make the delivery to your country,
I will update you of the delivery itinerary.

Henceforth, further correspondence should strictly be directed to this
email ID for security reasons. Nevertheless, re-confirm the following to me
as follows before the final departure of trunks as clearly stated above.

(a) Your full Names:
(b) Your physical mailing address:
(c) Your direct telephone numbers:
(d) Your occupation:

Thanks for your cooperation, God bless you and America!!
Best Regards,
Capt.Benson Morgan
US ARMY. (PRESENTLY IN SYRIA).

subject: Re: Dear Perry
body:
Dear Morgan,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing me with this information. I understand that you have come across a significant amount of money during your time in Iraq, and you are looking for assistance in safely transferring it. I appreciate your trust in me.

Could you please provide me with more details about the process of transferring the funds? How exactly will the Swift Military Courier ensure the security of the boxes during delivery? Also, what kind of insurance will be provided for the shipment?

Additionally, I would like to know more about your current assignment in Syria. What is your role there, and how long do you anticipate being stationed there?

Thank you again for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Perry
